title: SADS Case Study Project (SDL)
description: This project involved setting up a network environment using CentOS, where I configured the SSH server to enable secure access to a client computer. The setup also involved DHCP for automatic IP address assignment and learning how to configure SSH for secure remote access. Software used: Oracle VM VirtualBox and CentOS 8 Linux.

title: Restaurant Review Website
description: A website where users can sign up, log in, and review restaurants. Features include adding, updating, and deleting reviews, searching for restaurants, and filtering by cuisine and region. The website also integrates a Map API to show restaurant locations and allows users to update their profiles with drag-and-drop image upload functionality. Software used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Map API for location tracking.
features: Filter restaurants by cuisine (e.g., Western, Japanese)
Filter restaurants by region (e.g., West, East)
View, Add, Update, and Delete reviews
Review functionality restricted to logged-in users
Reviews can only be updated or deleted by the user who posted them

features: Power BI for visual data representation

title: Company Network Setup
